entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High 7. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023
